name: Base Alpha - A Space Story Puzzle Game
name_original: Base Alpha - A Space Story Puzzle Game
description:
Base Alpha is occupied by robots. You're the only one who can save it. If it fails, the Robots will take over the planet!

Base Alpha is a 2d text story puzzle game that will put your puzzle skills to the test!

You have to save Base Alpha from the robots by solving puzzles, some are harder than others. You need to find the crew, take out the robots and get everything back to normal!

You do this by solving puzzles, finding objects and reading the text carefully!

Specifications:

MINIMUM: 

OS: Windows 7 and above 

Processor: 1.2 ghz 

Memory: 2 GB RAM 

Graphics: 512 mb video memory 

Storage: 1 GB available space

WARNING:

This game is in early access. Why? We want to see how the community reacts and find bugs or errors that may exist in the game. So If you are playing the game and you see a bug, Don't panic. and contact us via games@beldrproductions.nl, Or via the comments below this page. We will try to fix it as soon as we can!

We recommend that you download our game using the itch.io app! So the game stays up to date during the early access period. This way, If we find bugs, The update will be automatically sent to your machine. So you don't need to manually download from this page!
